channel.title: Backup Amp Replication on Beautiful Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Backup Amp Replication on Beautiful Hugo

item.title: Veeam vCenter Migration Utility
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Way back in 2013, I published Preserve your Veeam B&R Backups Jobs when Moving vCenter, outlining how to “cheat” (by using a CNAME alias) to preserve your Veeam Backup & Replication jobs if you replace your VMware vCenter. Naturally, when there is a new vCenter instance, all the Virtual Machine Managed Object Reference’s (MoRef) change, which makes Veeam Backup & Replication start a new backup/replication chain, since all VMs are treated as new ones.

item.title: Win Free e-copies of Learning Veeam® Backup & Replication for VMware vSphere
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Update: The contest is now closed, and I have forwarded all comments to Packt Publishing, and they will contact the winners directly. Thanks to everyone who entered! I have teamed up with Packt Publishing to organize a giveaway of my new Veeam® Backup & Replication for VMware vSphere book. 3 lucky winners stand a chance to win e-copies of their new book. Keep reading to find out how you can be one of them!
